For DES algorithm, the instructions to test the program is as follows,

    --> The users enters their arbitrary plaintext and key but the plaintext and key should be in a hexadecimal format for the program to work properly.
    --> Once the users enters the plaintext and key then wait for the program to finish running and we can see the round function expansions of the S-box and P-box.
